Used - Like New or Open Box: An item in like new condition, without any scratches or scruffs and in perfect working condition. The original protective wrapping may be missing, but the original packaging is intact and in good condition with minor damage possible.

t: Marketplace Items Condition Guidelines - Amazon Customer Service
s: Used - Good: The item shows wear from consistent use, but it remains in good condition and functions properly. Item may arrive with damaged packaging or be repackaged. It may be marked, have identifying markings on it, or have minor cosmetic damage.
